类 LuckOpaquePainter

  • java.lang.Object
    • freeseawind.lf.canvas.LuckOpaquePainter

  • public class LuckOpaquePainter
extends Object
    Opaque draw class.
    版本:
    1.0
    作者:
    freeseawind@github

    • 方法概要

      方法 
      限定符和类型 方法和说明
      <T extends JComponent,E extends LuckCanvas> 
      void      		 paintOpaque(Graphics g, T component, E canvas)
      If the panel is translucent parent panel is used to draw the way, otherwise draw a completely opaque background to prevent aliasing font.
      <T extends JComponent,E extends LuckCanvas> 
      void      		 paintOpaque(Graphics g, T component, E canvas, Shape shape) 
      <T extends JComponent,E extends LuckCanvas> 
      void      		 paintOpaqueShap(Graphics g, T component, E canvas, Shape shape)
      If the panel is translucent parent panel is used to draw the way, otherwise draw a completely opaque background to prevent aliasing font.

    • 方法详细资料

      • paintOpaque

        public <T extends JComponent,E extends LuckCanvas> void paintOpaque(Graphics g,
                                                           T component,
                                                           E canvas)
        If the panel is translucent parent panel is used to draw the way, otherwise draw a completely opaque background to prevent aliasing font.
        类型参数:
        T - JComponent 子类
        E - canvas callback interface.
        参数:
        g - Drawing Canvas object information.
        component -
        canvas - call parent paint interface.

      • paintOpaqueShap

        public <T extends JComponent,E extends LuckCanvas> void paintOpaqueShap(Graphics g,
                                                               T component,
                                                               E canvas,
                                                               Shape shape)
        If the panel is translucent parent panel is used to draw the way, otherwise draw a completely opaque background to prevent aliasing font.
        类型参数:
        T - JComponent sub class.
        E - canvas callback interface.
        参数:
        g - Drawing Canvas object information.
        component -
        canvas - call parent paint interface.
        shape - pane shape.
